reviewText: It can only be seen three times on my computer. The one I gave as a gift not been used. Would love to have a version for region 1. Is it possible to get one. Please let me know.

I bought this DVD for my granddaughter...her favorite musical.  When she received it, it was in German!  She could not play it on her PC or her Mac.

Totally wasted my money!  If I was buying something in German, the cover art should have been in that language.

I would not have ordered the dvd if  I had known it was not in English.  My daughter even tried to pay it and it would not even come up. I would like another one in ENGLISH if possible. Please respond to this review
Was not the movie we thought.  Not the original sound of music

I'm in the military so by the time I was able to open and watch this movie I came to find out it didn't work. It isn't even able to make it to the previews or skip to the menu. It is unfortunate because by the time I was able to find out, the return window had closed.
A wonderful timeless family movie that my family will match over and over!
Very happy with product , and seller. Resonable price & quick shipping.  I highly recommend this seller!
I didn't understand that Region 2 meant it would be in a foreign language. My mistake!

This would not play on my Player AND it was in French instead of English. I complained and got back a reply i didn't
understand ,something about using a different Player.
I had to return this item due to no one's fault but my own. I didn't realize what a region 2 DVD was and that I was unable to watch it.
